column2: ggplot(aes(fill = ranking, x= ano |> year() |> as.character(), y= unidad_geografica_str)) +
title = "Water insecurity performance ranking by year for each Mexican state",

subtitle = str_wrap("Nuevo Le√≥n had 7.004% of homes with not enough available water in 2021, ranking in fifth place compared to other states. In 2022, the state ranked in last place with 42.014% of homes experiencing water insecurity in 2022."),
